title: Stacks 2.5 - The Most Elegant Way to Convert Currency
text: Stacks 2.5 - The Most Elegant Way to Convert Currency July 22, 2015 in Finance [prMac.com] Chennai, India - WapleStuff today is pleased to announce the release of Stacks 2.5, an update to their popular iOS app. Stacks is the first and only app in the App Store that lets you convert currencies right in your safari browser. Stacks automatically converts prices in a webpage to your desired currency. Stacks 2.5 update includes Apple Watch Support, New Exchange Rate Widget, Smart Pasting, Support for Transaction/Exchange Fee and much more. And also now, Stacks is accessible to VoiceOver users. So they can drive the interface even if they can't see it. Stacks is designed to be simple and straight forward. It comes with two today widgets; Quick Converter and Exchange Rates, so your currency conversion need is always just a swipe away. With Stacks you can bookmark your currency conversions for future reference. It also has a simple interactive chart, that shows you the historical data for the past 100 days. Exchange rates are updated at launch time and frequency at which you set. You can disable it when traveling to avoid any roaming charges. Since Stacks stores the exchange rates, it can work without any internet connection. Features: * Today Widget - New exchange rates widget (New) * Today Widget - Redesigned quick converter widget (New) * Support for Transaction/Exchange Fee (New) * Smart pasting from clipboard (New) * Ability to set Currencies by Country Name (New) * Multi currency conversion view (New) * Widget and Safari Extension follows update frequency settings (New) * Customize number of days in history chart (New) * Accessibility (New) * Safari Extention - ability to convert currencies in your browser * Supports over 160 World Currencies * Bookmark List
